segments.text: I see the girl reaching up, hoping to get a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, just waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing so precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the water overflowing yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the kids; they’re just trying to get a snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But someone needs to step in before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
